data.text:
Step into the WWE ring in Season 5 of Call of DutyÂ®: Warzoneâ¢ Mobile! Featuring WWE themed content, new map updates, modes, and Battle Pass.

Drop into real Call of Duty action with exhilarating FPS Battle Royale and Multiplayer gameplay, featuring Call of Duty: Warzone style combat and weapons with real graphics. Squad up for PvP battles, and fight to win in this Battle Royale mobile game.

Explore iconic FPS Battle Royale maps, Verdansk and Rebirth Island. Enter Shipment, Shoot House, and Scrapyard, high-octane Multiplayer maps in Call of Duty, built for fun, fast-paced firefights. Powered by Call of Duty technology, with Call of Duty: Warzone Mobile you can level up shared weapons, earn shared XP, and bring it all to Call of Duty: Modern WarfareÂ® III and Call of Duty: Warzone for the ultimate connected Call of Duty experience.

MULTIPLAYER FPS ACTION LIKE NEVER SEEN BEFORE

Fight for survival in this thrilling action game built for mobile. Tactical multiplayer combat, PvP shooting mechanics, and fast team-based actionâall at your fingertips.

GAMEPLAY YOUR WAY

Call of Duty: Warzone Mobile delivers on immersive gameplay with next level graphics and customization. Discover more with Call of Duty: Warzone Mobile Originals â weapons, operators, events, and Battle Pass content that is currently only on mobile.

WE GOT THE MAPS

Return to Verdansk and Rebirth Island, deploying to your favorite Points of Interest and wreaking PvP havoc on enemies!

MORE REAL PLAYERS

Showoff your battle skills by surviving and dominating the frontlines against real players in competitive Battle Royale matches. Squad up and build your best tactical team to defeat rivals in PvP battles.

CALL OF DUTY AS ONE

World class Call of Duty cross-progression technology allows you to take shared weapons, operators, and Battle Pass XP with you anywhere on mobile. Jump into exciting Battle Royale action and enjoy the FPS multiplayer battlefield togetherâ anywhere, anytime.

READ BEFORE DOWNLOAD

This game will work only on devices listed below.

At least 8GB of free space is required to install the full game.

*Battle Pass cross-progression is shared with certain titles (sold separately). See www.callofduty.com/warzonemobile for more details.

This app contains social features that allow you to connect and play with friends. Enable push notifications to be informed when exciting events and new content are taking place in the game. You can choose whether to utilize these features. Requires a persistent internet connection (network fees may apply). Age restrictions apply. Allows players to communicate. Includes optional in-game purchases of virtual currency that can be used to acquire virtual in-game items.
